General.Name: Shenyang Toly Bread Co Ltd
General.Description: Toly Bread Co.,Ltd. engages in producing, processing, and sale of bakery products in China. It offers breads, cakes, pastries, and moon cakes, as well as dumplings. Taoli Bread Co., Ltd. engages in production, processing, and sales of baked food. The company offers peach plum bread, peach and plum mooncake, and peach and plum zongzi. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Toly Bread Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Toly Bread Co.,Ltd. in March 2017. Toly Bread Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shenyang, China.
